ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.label: AIR INTAKE PIPING/TUBING:
ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.content: Check for loose, punctured or worn pieces

ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.label: ENGINE COOLING FAN:
ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.content: Check for nicks, cracks or loose pieces

ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.label: DIESEL EXHAUST FLUID (DEF) LEVEL:
ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.content: Check fluid level (if stored, refer to chassis storage and periods of non-use section for further information).

ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.label: FUEL/WATER SEPARATOR:
ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.content: Drain checking for presence of water

ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.label: COOLANT HOSES, PIPES AND CLAMPS:
ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.content: Check for leaks, loose clamps and chafing

ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.label: CHECK EXHAUST PIPING AND MUFFLER:
ENGINE, COOLING AND EXHAUST.content: Check that all components are secure

SUSPENSION.label: FRONT SHOCKS:
SUSPENSION.content: Inspect for leaks and that all components are secure

SUSPENSION.label: REAR SHOCKS:
SUSPENSION.content: Inspect for leaks and that all components are secure

TIRES AND WHEELS.label: TIRES:
TIRES AND WHEELS.content: Check for wear and damage, check and adjust air pressure (refer to tire manufacturer's manual for recommended air pressure settings)

TIRES AND WHEELS.label: WHEELS:
TIRES AND WHEELS.content: Wheel nuts/torque to 450â€“500 lbs. ft. (tighten after first 50 miles and 50 miles after each time a wheel is serviced)
